content.description:
Start right of

Down With People

on the right side of the Giant Steps Right Boulder.  Begin underneath the overhanging arete and follow a low, shoulder-busting traverse into the prow and climb

DWP

.
content.location: Farthest right route on the Giant Steps Right Boulder.

content.description: Left-most face route on the Giant Steps Right boulder.  Thin start and a tall face will take you to the top of this problem.
content.location: Giant steps right boulder. Left side.

content.description: The obvious middle dihedral/flake right in the middle of the Giant Steps Right boulder.  Undercling your way up the flake to the tall topout.
content.location: Middle of the Giant steps right boulder.

content.description: This hidden gem lies in the gully uphill from the Giants Steps. It is short and has a jenky landing but offers fun movement on incredibly slippery, water polished rock. Start squatting on a sloper on the left side of the boulder, then work right on crimps then straight up to a difficult top.
content.location: Up the hillside and to the left of the Giants Steps a couple yards, it climbs a short overhang facing the rock outcropping.

content.description: This route is a kind-of direct start to La Fissura.  Climb the face just right of the big dihedral on the Giant Steps right boulder, to end joining with the terminating dihedral for a topout.
content.location: Middle of the Giant steps right boulder.

content.description:
This is the direct start to

The Italian Stallion

. Begin sitting with some low opposing edges. Pull on with difficulty, and make 1 or 2 hard moves on crimps to join back up with

The Italian Stallion

in the middle of the boulder. Finish on that climb.

Horse Girl is another perfect contender for your Clear Creek lowball to-do list. 4 star rock, a 1 star line, and 3 star movement make this a 2 star V9 worth doing.
content.location: On Italian Stallion Boulder, in the wash, begin at the bottom of the overhang in the middle of the wall on crimps.

content.description: DWP is the line going straight up the prow on the right side of the Giant Steps Right Boulder.  Start on the prow and head straight up.
content.location: Right side of the Giant Steps Right Boulder.
